title: Bug 117981 - Cannot select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected at the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view the first time.

Observed Behavior (OB):
No item is selected when attempting to select it for the first time.

Expected Behavior (EB):
The item should be selected upon the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
3. Notice that the item cannot be selected.
4. Repeat steps 2-3. On the second attempt, the item should be selected successfully.
